sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Button, Grid, Card, CardMedia, CardContent, Divider } from '@mui/material';
import { styled } from '@mui/system';

// Styled Components for Premium Look
const HeroSection = styled(Box)({
  backgroundImage: `url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1523381210434-271e8be1f52b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1350&q=80')`, // Dummy hero image
  backgroundSize: 'cover',
  backgroundPosition: 'center',
  height: '90vh',
  display: 'flex',
  flexDirection: 'column',
  justifyContent: 'center',
  alignItems: 'center',
  color: '#ffffff',
  textAlign: 'center',
  padding: '0 40px',
  position: 'relative',
  '&:before': {
    content: '""',
    position: 'absolute',
    top: 0,
    left: 0,
    right: 0,
    bottom: 0,
    backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)', // Darker overlay for better contrast
  },
});

const HeroButton = styled(Button)({
  backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
  color: '#000000',
  padding: '16px 50px',
  fontSize: '1.3rem',
  fontWeight: 'bold',
  borderRadius: '50px',
  textTransform: 'none',
  boxShadow: '0 4px 15px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4)',
  transition: 'background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease',
  '&:hover': {
    backgroundColor: '#e0e0e0',
    transform: 'scale(1.05)',
    boxShadow: '0 6px 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6)',
  },
});

const Section = styled(Box)({
  padding: '120px 60px', // Increased padding for a luxurious feel
  backgroundColor: '#000000',
  color: '#ffffff',
  maxWidth: '1400px',
  margin: '0 auto',
});

const ProductCard = styled(Card)({
  backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
  color: '#ffffff',
  borderRadius: '16px',
  overflow: 'hidden',
  transition: 'transform 0.4s ease, box-shadow 0.4s ease',
  height: '100%',
  display: 'flex',
  flexDirection: 'column',
  position: 'relative',
  border: '1px solid transparent',
  background: 'linear-gradient(#1a1a1a, #1a1a1a) padding-box, linear-gradient(45deg, #ffffff, #cccccc) border-box', // Gradient border
  '&:hover': {
    transform: 'translateY(-15px)',
    boxShadow: '0 15px 40px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)',
    background: 'linear-gradient(#1a1a1a, #1a1a1a) padding-box, linear-gradient(45deg, #e0e0e0, #ffffff) border-box',
  },
  '&:before': {
    content: '""',
    position: 'absolute',
    top: 0,
    left: 0,
    right: 0,
    height: '4px',
    background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, #ffffff, #cccccc)', // Gradient top bar
    transition: 'height 0.3s ease',
  },
  '&:hover:before': {
    height: '8px',
  },
});

const ProductCardContent = styled(CardContent)({
  flexGrow: 1,
  display: 'flex',
  flexDirection: 'column',
  justifyContent: 'space-between',
  textAlign: 'center',
  padding: '25px',
  backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
});

const SectionTitle = styled(Typography)({
  fontWeight: 'bold',
  fontSize: '3.2rem',
  marginBottom: '70px',
  textAlign: 'center',
  color: '#ffffff',
  position: 'relative',
  letterSpacing: '1px',
  '&:after': {
    content: '""',
    position: 'absolute',
    width: '100px',
    height: '4px',
    backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
    bottom: '-20px',
    left: '50%',
    transform: 'translateX(-50%)',
  },
});

const BrandStorySection = styled(Box)({
  backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
  padding: '80px 60px',
  maxWidth: '1400px',
  margin: '0 auto',
  textAlign: 'center',
  color: '#ffffff',
});

// Updated Dummy Data for Men's and Women's Oversized Tees
const featuredProducts = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Men's Oversized Classic Tee - Black",
    price: '₹1299',
    description: 'A timeless black oversized tee for men, crafted from 100% premium cotton. Perfect for casual outings with its soft, breathable fabric and minimalist design.',
    material: '100% Cotton',
    fit: 'Oversized',
    care: 'Machine Washable',
    sizes: 'S, M, L, XL, XXL',
    colors: 'Black, White, Navy',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503342217505-b0a15ec3261c?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Women's Oversized Graphic Tee - White",
    price: '₹1499',
    description: 'A stylish white oversized tee for women with a bold graphic print. Made with a cotton blend, this tee offers comfort and durability for everyday wear.',
    material: 'Cotton Blend',
    fit: 'Oversized',
    care: 'Hand Wash Recommended',
    sizes: 'S, M, L, XL',
    colors: 'White, Grey, Black',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1521572163474-6864f9cf17ab?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Men's Oversized Street Tee - Grey",
    price: '₹1399',
    description: 'A grey oversized street tee for men, designed with a relaxed fit and soft fabric. Ideal for a laid-back, urban look with a modern edge.',
    material: '100% Cotton',
    fit: 'Oversized',
    care: 'Machine Washable',
    sizes: 'M, L, XL, XXL',
    colors: 'Grey, Black, Charcoal',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571945153237-3b3b3f8e25da?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: "Women's Oversized Vintage Tee - Olive",
    price: '₹1399',
    description: 'A vintage-inspired olive oversized tee for women with a faded wash. Offers a retro vibe with modern comfort, perfect for a casual, stylish look.',
    material: '100% Cotton',
    fit: 'Oversized',
    care: 'Machine Washable',
    sizes: 'S, M, L, XL',
    colors: 'Olive, Brown, Blue',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618519764620-7403ab66ab5f?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
  },
];

const newArrivals = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Men's Oversized Striped Tee - Blue/White",
    price: '₹1599',
    description: 'A fresh take on classic stripes, this blue and white oversized tee for men is made from breathable cotton, perfect for a casual yet stylish look.',
    material: '100% Cotton',
    fit: 'Oversized',
    care: 'Machine Washable',
    sizes: 'S, M, L, XL',
    colors: 'Blue/White, Red/White',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1607349913338-90f497e6a4d8?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Women's Oversized Tie-Dye Tee - Purple",
    price: '₹1699',
    description: 'A bold purple tie-dye oversized tee for women, crafted with a unique pattern and soft cotton fabric for all-day comfort and a trendy look.',
    material: '100% Cotton',
    fit: 'Oversized',
    care: 'Machine Washable',
    sizes: 'S, M, L, XL',
    colors: 'Purple, Green, Blue',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1594633312681-863f110f7f9d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Men's Oversized Minimal Tee - Beige",
    price: '₹1499',
    description: 'A minimalist beige oversized tee for men, featuring a clean design and soft cotton fabric. Perfect for a versatile, everyday wardrobe staple.',
    material: '100% Cotton',
    fit: 'Oversized',
    care: 'Machine Washable',
    sizes: 'M, L, XL, XXL',
    colors: 'Beige, Black, Grey',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1605408499391-6368c628ef42?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: "Women's Oversized Pastel Tee - Pink",
    price: '₹1599',
    description: 'A soft pink oversized tee for women in a pastel shade, made from breathable cotton. Ideal for a chic, relaxed look with a feminine touch.',
    material: '100% Cotton',
    fit: 'Oversized',
    care: 'Machine Washable',
    sizes: 'S, M, L, XL',
    colors: 'Pink, Lavender, Mint',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1607349913338-90f497e6a4d8?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
  },
];

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ backgroundColor: '#000000', minHeight: '100vh' }}>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <HeroSection>
        <Typography
          variant="h1"
          sx={{
            fontSize: { xs: '3rem', md: '5.5rem' },
            zIndex: 1,
            mb: 3,
            fontWeight: 'bold',
            letterSpacing: '3px',
            color: '#ffffff',
            textShadow: '0 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)', // Subtle shadow for depth
          }}
        >
          Premium Oversized Tees
        </Typography>
        <Typography
          variant="h5"
          sx={{
            zIndex: 1,
            mb: 5,
            maxWidth: '900px',
            fontWeight: 300,
            lineHeight: 1.6,
            color: '#ffffff',
            fontSize: { xs: '1.2rem', md: '1.5rem' },
          }}
        >
          Discover the ultimate blend of comfort and style with Baa M Boo’s exclusive collection of oversized tees for men and women. Crafted with premium materials for a perfect fit that lasts. Elevate your wardrobe with our curated designs, made to stand out and feel exceptional.
        </Typography>
        <Box sx={{ zIndex: 1 }}>
          <HeroButton href="#shop">Shop Now</HeroButton>
        </Box>
      </HeroSection>

      {/* Featured Products Section */}
      <Section>
        <SectionTitle>Featured Collection</SectionTitle>
        <Grid container spacing={5} justifyContent="center">
          {featuredProducts.map((product) => (
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3} key={product.id}>
              <ProductCard>
                <CardMedia
                  component="img"
                  height="400" // Increased height for a more premium look
                  image={product.image}
                  alt={product.name}
                  sx={{ objectFit: 'cover' }}
                />
                <ProductCardContent>
                  <Box>
                    <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ fontWeight: 600, color: '#ffffff', mb: 1.5 }}>
                      {product.name}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: '#cccccc', mb: 2, lineHeight: 1.7, fontSize: '0.95rem' }}>
                      {product.description}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ color: '#ffffff', fontWeight: 'bold', mb: 1.5 }}>
                      {product.price}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block', mb: 0.5 }}>
                      Material: {product.material}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block', mb: 0.5 }}>
                      Fit: {product.fit}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block', mb: 0.5 }}>
                      Care: {product.care}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block', mb: 0.5 }}>
                      Sizes: {product.sizes}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block' }}>
                      Colors: {product.colors}
                    </Typography>
                  </Box>
                  <Button
                    sx={{
                      mt: 3,
                      color: '#ffffff',
                      border: '1px solid #ffffff',
                      borderRadius: '25px',
                      padding: '10px 25px',
                      textTransform: 'none',
                      fontWeight: 'bold',
                      fontSize: '0.9rem',
                      transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                      '&:hover': {
                        backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
                        color: '#000000',
                        boxShadow: '0 4px 15px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4)',
                        transform: 'scale(1.02)',
                      },
                    }}
                  >
                    Add to Cart
                  </Button>
                </ProductCardContent>
              </ProductCard>
            </Grid>
          ))}
        </Grid>
      </Section>

      {/* New Arrivals Section */}
      <Section>
        <SectionTitle>New Arrivals</SectionTitle>
        <Grid container spacing={5} justifyContent="center">
          {newArrivals.map((product) => (
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3} key={product.id}>
              <ProductCard>
                <CardMedia
                  component="img"
                  height="400"
                  image={product.image}
                  alt={product.name}
                  sx={{ objectFit: 'cover' }}
                />
                <ProductCardContent>
                  <Box>
                    <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ fontWeight: 600, color: '#ffffff', mb: 1.5 }}>
                      {product.name}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: '#cccccc', mb: 2, lineHeight: 1.7, fontSize: '0.95rem' }}>
                      {product.description}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ color: '#ffffff', fontWeight: 'bold', mb: 1.5 }}>
                      {product.price}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block', mb: 0.5 }}>
                      Material: {product.material}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block', mb: 0.5 }}>
                      Fit: {product.fit}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block', mb: 0.5 }}>
                      Care: {product.care}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block', mb: 0.5 }}>
                      Sizes: {product.sizes}
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: '#999999', display: 'block' }}>
                      Colors: {product.colors}
                    </Typography>
                  </Box>
                  <Button
                    sx={{
                      mt: 3,
                      color: '#ffffff',
                      border: '1px solid #ffffff',
                      borderRadius: '25px',
                      padding: '10px 25px',
                      textTransform: 'none',
                      fontWeight: 'bold',
                      fontSize: '0.9rem',
                      transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                      '&:hover': {
                        backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
                        color: '#000000',
                        boxShadow: '0 4px 15px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4)',
                        transform: 'scale(1.02)',
                      },
                    }}
                  >
                    Add to Cart
                  </Button>
                </ProductCardContent>
              </ProductCard>
            </Grid>
          ))}
        </Grid>
      </Section>

      {/* Brand Story Section */}
      <BrandStorySection>
        <SectionTitle>Our Story</SectionTitle>
        <Typography
          variant="h6"
          sx={{
            maxWidth: '900px',
            margin: '0 auto',
            lineHeight: 1.8,
            color: '#cccccc',
            fontWeight: 300,
            fontSize: '1.2rem',
            mb: 4,
          }}
        >
          Baa M Boo was born out of a passion for redefining casual fashion. We believe that comfort and style should go hand in hand, which is why we specialize in premium oversized tees for men and women. Our journey began in 2023 with a small team of designers who wanted to create clothing that breaks the mold of traditional fits, offering a fresh, modern take on streetwear.
        </Typography>
        <Typography
          variant="body1"
          sx={{
            maxWidth: '900px',
            margin: '0 auto',
            lineHeight: 1.8,
            color: '#cccccc',
            fontWeight: 300,
            fontSize: '1rem',
          }}
        >
          Every piece in our collection is crafted with the finest materials, ensuring durability, breathability, and a luxurious feel. From our signature oversized tees to our seasonal collections, we’re committed to sustainability and ethical production practices, partnering with manufacturers who share our values. Join us in embracing a new era of fashion where comfort meets elegance.
        </Typography>
      </BrandStorySection>

      {/* Divider Before Footer */}
      <Divider sx={{ backgroundColor: '#ffffff', height: '1px', maxWidth: '1400px', margin: '0 auto' }} />
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Home;
